name: The last Breath (itch)
description:
A short 3D horror game.
Find a way to escape, the shadows lurk in the dark, don't let them catch you.


Status       In development
Platforms    Windows
Minimum system Requirements:
Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce GTX 750-class
DirectX: 11.0.
Storage: 7GB.
OS: Windows 7 or newer.
